Description: Fragment of a vessel: fragment of a vessel with opaque deep-violet body. The major portion of the surface is decorated with wide threads in yellow, white, light green, and turquoise-blue in a marbleized pattern having much of the effect of a smoke design. The colours are all opaque and the decorations have a feeling of great freedom and movement. Low gloss. The remains of a very fine vessel. Brown core.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (fig.32, p.33)
